Title: Relates to authorizing a five mile per hour speed limit for open streets in cities having a population in excess of one million
Summary: Relates to authorizing a five mile per hour speed limit for open streets in cities having a population in excess of one million.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to authorizing a five mile per hour speed limit for open streets in cities having a population in excess of one million
